      Subinterfaces of Options in com.stormpath.sdk.account 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AccountCriteria
      An Account-specific Criteria class, enabling an Account-specific fluentquery DSL.
      interface  AccountOptions<T>

    • Uses of Options in com.stormpath.sdk.ds

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.ds with type parameters of type Options 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends Resource,O extends Options>
      T      		 DataStore.getResource(String href, Class<T> clazz, O options)
      Retrieves the resource at the specified href according to the specified Options and returns the resource as an instance of the specified clazz.
